abstract: A version of the iPhone that would work on Verizon’s network could be available as soon as next year.
snippet: A version of the iPhone that would work on Verizon’s network could be available as soon as next year.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The iPhone may be poised to shake up the cellphone industry a second time.

headline.main: Verizon Said to Be in Talks for the iPhone
headline.print_headline: Verizon Said To Be in Talks For the iPhone

abstract: AT&T is bringing out a 60-second version of its most recent 30-second spot about a charitable shoe company.
snippet: AT&T is bringing out a 60-second version of its most recent 30-second spot about a charitable shoe company.
lead_paragraph: At a time when most TV viewers would like to see 30-second commercials become three-second commercials — or maybe even zero-second commercials — a big advertiser is bringing out a 60-second version of its most recent 30-second spot.

headline.main: You Make the Call as AT&T Supersizes a Spot About Shoes
